name: Toribash: Violence Perfected
overview: Toribash is the online fighting game where you make all the moves! Use precision motion control to create any move you want—the only limit is your imagination! Manipulate your fighter’s joints for maximum impact and take out your opponents with precise hits. Boost your joints for that added speed and strength to hit harder then grab your opponents and slam them to the ground. Fight online and challenge players around the world using Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection! Want to make your own fight movies? Just jump into the replay editor. You can enter replays at any point in time and review your fight to catch that mind-blowing move you missed. And when you are done, share it with your buddies through WiiConnect24! • Challenge fighters around the world. • Relive your glorious fights from any angle using the replay editor. • Pull off spectacular moves using Wii Remote motion controls.
